mapper.select: SELECT td_kspjong_basic.f15001 AS f15001 /* 현재가 */ , td_kspjong_basic.f15007 AS f15007 /* 기준가 */ , td_kspjong_basic.f15004 AS f15004 /* 등락률 */ , td_kspjong_basic.f15003 AS f15472 /* 대비 */ , td_kspjong_basic.f16013 AS f16013 /* 종목코드 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f16583 AS f16583 /* 사무수탁회사번호 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f16013 AS f16013 /* ETF 단축코드 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f16316 AS f16316 /* 구성종목코드 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f33837 AS f33837 /* 구성종목수 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f16499 AS f16499 /* 1CU단위증권수 */ , FORMAT( td_etfpdf_basic.f16499, 2) AS fmt_f16499 /* 1CU단위증권수 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f33861 AS f33861 /* ETF시장구분 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f34840 AS f34840 /* 액면금액설정현금액 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f16588 AS f16588 /* 평가금액 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f34743 AS f34743 /* ETF_PDF비중 */ , td_etfpdf_basic.f16004 AS f16004 /* 해외시장종목명 */ FROM td_etfpdf_basic LEFT OUTER JOIN td_kspjong_basic ON td_etfpdf_basic.f16316 = td_kspjong_basic.f16012 /* 국제표준코드 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND td_etfpdf_basic.f16012 = #{f16012} /* 국제표준코드 */

SELECT td_etnpdf_basic.f16583 AS f16583 /* 사무수탁회사번호 */ , td_etnpdf_basic.f16013 AS f16013 /* ETF 단축코드 */ , td_etnpdf_basic.f16316 AS f16316 /* 구성종목코드 */ , td_etnpdf_basic.f33837 AS f33837 /* 구성종목수 */ , td_etnpdf_basic.f16541 AS f16004 /* 종목명 */ , '4' AS f33861 /* 시장구분 */ FROM td_etnpdf_basic WHERE 1 = 1 AND td_etnpdf_basic.f16012 = #{f16012} /* 국제표준코드 */
